\subsection{Detailed Description}
This class allows you to get direct access to certain bits of system information and information about the P\-H\-P configuration 

\subsection{Constructor \& Destructor Documentation}
\hypertarget{classsystem_a3c2c97b7c3cc17e9ab8a94d8e96bbd27}{\index{system@{system}!\-\_\-\-\_\-construct@{\-\_\-\-\_\-construct}}

\item[{}]{\$methods = {\ttfamily null}}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}}\label{classsystem_a3c2c97b7c3cc17e9ab8a94d8e96bbd27}
Class constructor creates a list of the methods. This list can be filtered. The list can then be called as a group of anonymous functions or variable functions
